msbt.message: Happy Bunny Day! Everybody looks soooo cute in their colorful pastel outfits today! Now, I know it's not a fashion contest, but if it wereI would SO win! I mean, just look at me I have EGGScellent fashion sense! Hahaha!

Zipper is going ALL OUT with his dance moves. He keeps going and going and never seems to get tired. I wonder if he's ever been a backup dancer? I could totes use someone like him when I get up on stage!

Those Bunny Day eggs are legit awesome. I mean, they're totes cute AND they're totes edible. But I'm so conflicted! Should I eat them? Should I put them on display?Oh, who am I kidding. Eating them is the ONLY way to go, .
What is going on with the sky today? There are sooo many balloons floating around, ! And those colorful ones! Have you seen them? It's like they're just begging to be popped! Amiright?

Oh, so, I took a walk down by the water looking for some inspiration for my newest hit song And I saw one of those message bottles covered in Bunny Day colors!I totes should have checked it out. But just then these epic lyrics came to me! They went like ♪ Oooh, oooh, message in a boooottleooh ooh, makes me hungry for a waffle ♪ Anyhoo, I rushed home to write them down so I wouldn't forget them.But you should definitely go down there and check it out. Maybe you'll find something.Or maybe you'll find the inspiration for a song, .

Just so you know, I am, like, really good at giving advice.And, lucky you, I have some egg- hunting advice I am dying to share. With you, I mean. Here it goes I've noticed that you can get LOTS of eggs by hitting trees that look more, I don't know, BENDY. I mean, you should hit all the trees. But coconut trees are where it's at. You're welcome, .

OK, so, there's this tree that isn't supposed to grow any fruit. It's just not that kind of tree, which is cool. But there I was, looking at it, and IkidyounotI saw what looked like eggs growing in it! Of COURSE I shook 'em all down. How could I not? And they were totally, definitely, for sure EGGS. If you don't believe me, go look for yourself. You'll see. Eggs are growing on trees, .

If I told you I went fishing and ended up catching an egg instead of a fish Would you believe me? Look at this adorable face. Would this face lie? No! It totally wouldn't. Not about fishing up eggs, anyway. Anyway, I think it has something to do with Bunny Day.That or the fish around here have some serious explaining to do, .
It's FINALLY Bunny Day! We both know what that means. Time to hunt down some eggs, !
The egg hunt is ON! It's Bunny Day, and that means it's EGG TIME. Let's get right to it, !

Aha! You're just the person I was looking for, .In true "me" fashion, I went a little overboard collecting those adorable .That means today's your lucky day! Want to trade 3 of my eggs for 3 different eggs, ?
Totally!
Nah.

Look who it is! It's my number-one fan, !How's your egg hunt going? I'm doingwell. Too well, when it comes to .That's why I was woooondering if you'd like to trade 3 of those for 3 different eggs. You do, right?
I sure do!
Not really.
Yay! I knew you'd agree! I can't wait to see what type of eggs you're going to trade me
For realsies?! Yaaaay! Let's get this thing rolling before you change your mind!
Heehee, thanks for this! Somehow the eggs of another are always cuter than your own, .
You can rest easy tonight knowing you put a big ol' smile on my face today. Thanks so much for the trade!
Changed your mind? Boo, I say! Buuut I totes understand. I'll just go and ask someone else.
Awww, that's too bad. But nothing can keep this future star down! I'll try asking someone else.
So, 3 for 3 , right?
Right!
Wrong.
Hooray! Let's trade!
Ohmigosh! You're going to laugh, but we can't trade because of those overflowing pockets of yours.Heehee, you work that out, and maybe I'll hit you up again later.
